CreateApplication.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tem.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateApplication
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ApplicationName": "xx",
    "SubnetList": [
        "xx"
    ],
    "Description": "xx",
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "DeployMode": "xx",
    "RepoServer": "xx",
    "SourceChannel": 0,
    "RepoType": 0,
    "RepoName": "xx",
    "UseDefaultImageService": 0,
    "CodingLanguage": "xx"
}
CreateApplication.title: 创建应用
